name: Old-TV Shooter
description:
It's one of the games you play on PS2, Atari or gameboy. The style is like old-tv. It feels nostalgic (a little)

How to play:

W, A, S, D keys to move around

*Player always looks to mouse

Mouse1 (Left Mouse Button) to shoot bullet

Features:

When you get coin you gain +10 points,

if its cherry you gain extra speed and reduce shooting cooldown

Every 5 second enemy spawn times gets faster

There is no pause screen etc in the game. Game is not completed yet. If you find any bugs or have some really good ideas, write below in the comments or dm me in discord (also below) I will try to fix and improve the game. I tested game for only windows (bcuz I don't have any mac or linux device). If might not work correct

Social Medias:
